name: Asociatia RHRN - Romanian Harm Reduction Network
goal:
Romanian Harm Reduction Network mission is to promote the harm reduction approach by facilitating communication between partner organizations, to improve harm reduction services quality at national level and to facilitate the implementation of effective policies and programs targeting drug users and other vulnerable groups.

RHRN has the following objectives:
• To rise stakeholders awareness with regards to human rights, the need to implement the international treaties, national and European legislation regarding drug users rights;
• To initiate and to develop effective public policies targeting drug users and other marginalized groups;
• To organize public campaigns to fight the discrimination and stigma associated with marginalized people and drug users;
• To advocate for innovative harm reduction services and alternatives to drug use.

Romanian Harm Reduction Network main areas of expertise are communication, training, research and campaigning for continuity and scaling-up of harm reduction based services at local, national and international level.
interests: Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Youth
euInitiatives: Involvement and participation in the activity of Civil Society Forum on Drugs since 2007.
